EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Telco Luncheon Series_Q314.07 Sorry Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry you couldn't attend the Executive Luncheon on Telecommunications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ-Telco-luncheonseries.html> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for attending our Executive Luncheon on Telecommunications. We hope you enjoyed the event.
Here is a link to some recent blog articles that Paul Davey has written that you might find of interest: http://blog.pivotal.io/author/pdavey
The Pivotal Team
